# AndyOS Vendor Overlay

System UI and framework overlays for AndyOS branding and privacy defaults.

## Structure

### overlay/
- Framework resource overlays
- SystemUI modifications
- Settings app customizations
- Default app configurations

### bootanimation/
- Custom AndyOS boot animation
- Shutdown animation
- Logo assets

### keys/
- AVB signing keys (gitignored)
- OTA signing certificates
- Key generation scripts

### prebuilt/
- F-Droid APK
- Privacy tools
- Essential apps
